union:
theorem star_convex.union (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (ht : star_convex 𝕜 x t) : star_convex 𝕜 x (s ∪ t) :=
  by
  rintro y (hy | hy) a b ha hb hab
  · exact or.inl (hs hy ha hb hab)
  · exact or.inr (ht hy ha hb hab)
#align star_convex.union star_convex.union
sub':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem star_convex.sub' {s : set (E × E)} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (x, y) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (x - y) («expr '' » (fun x : E × E => x.1 - x.2) s) :=
  hs.is_linear_image is_linear_map.is_linear_map_sub
#align star_convex.sub' star_convex.sub'
sub:
theorem star_convex.sub (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (ht : star_convex 𝕜 y t) : star_convex 𝕜 (x - y) (s - t) :=
  by
  simp_rw [sub_eq_add_neg]
  exact hs.add ht.neg
#align star_convex.sub star_convex.sub
star_convex_zero_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex_zero_iff : star_convex 𝕜 0 s ↔ ∀ ⦃x : E⦄, x ∈ s → ∀ ⦃a : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → a ≤ 1 → «expr • » a x ∈ s :=
  by
  refine' forall_congr' fun x => forall_congr' fun hx => ⟨fun h a ha₀ ha₁ => _, fun h a b ha hb hab => _⟩
  ·
    simpa only [sub_add_cancel, eq_self_iff_true, forall_true_left, zero_add, smul_zero] using
      h (sub_nonneg_of_le ha₁) ha₀
  · rw [smul_zero, zero_add]
    exact
      h hb
        (by
          rw [← hab]
          exact le_add_of_nonneg_left ha)
#align star_convex_zero_iff star_convex_zero_iff
star_convex_univ:
theorem star_convex_univ (x : E) : star_convex 𝕜 x univ := fun _ _ _ _ _ _ _ => trivial
#align star_convex_univ star_convex_univ
star_convex_singleton:
theorem star_convex_singleton (x : E) : star_convex 𝕜 x {x} :=
  by
  rintro y (rfl : y = x) a b ha hb hab
  exact Convex.combo_self hab _
#align star_convex_singleton star_convex_singleton
star_convex_sUnion:
theorem star_convex_sUnion {S : set (set E)} (hS : ∀ s ∈ S, star_convex 𝕜 x s) : star_convex 𝕜 x (⋃₀ S) :=
  by
  rw [sUnion_eq_Union]
  exact star_convex_Union fun s => hS _ s.2
#align star_convex_sUnion star_convex_sUnion
star_convex_sInter:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂₀ » -/
theorem star_convex_sInter {S : set (set E)} (h : ∀ s ∈ S, star_convex 𝕜 x s) : star_convex 𝕜 x («expr⋂₀ » S) :=
  fun y hy a b ha hb hab s hs => h s hs (hy s hs) ha hb hab
#align star_convex_sInter star_convex_sInter
star_convex_pi:
theorem star_convex_pi {ι : Type _} {E : ι → Type _} [∀ i, add_comm_monoid (E i)] [∀ i, SMul 𝕜 (E i)] {x : ∀ i, E i}
    {s : set ι} {t : ∀ i, set (E i)} (ht : ∀ ⦃i⦄, i ∈ s → star_convex 𝕜 (x i) (t i)) : star_convex 𝕜 x (s.pi t) :=
  fun y hy a b ha hb hab i hi => ht hi (hy i hi) ha hb hab
#align star_convex_pi star_convex_pi
star_convex_iff_segment_subset:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `segment -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2021 Yaël Dillies. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Yaël Dillies
-/
theorem star_convex_iff_segment_subset : star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔ ∀ ⦃y⦄, y ∈ s → segment x 𝕜 y ⊆ s :=
  by
  constructor
  · rintro h y hy z ⟨a, b, ha, hb, hab, rfl⟩
    exact h hy ha hb hab
  · rintro h y hy a b ha hb hab
    exact h hy ⟨a, b, ha, hb, hab, rfl⟩
#align star_convex_iff_segment_subset star_convex_iff_segment_subset
star_convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Alternative definition of star-convexity, in terms of pointwise set operations. -/
theorem star_convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset :
    star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔ ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → 0 ≤ b → a + b = 1 → «expr • » a {x} + «expr • » b s ⊆ s :=
  by
  refine' ⟨_, fun h y hy a b ha hb hab => h ha hb hab (add_mem_add (smul_mem_smul_set <| mem_singleton _) ⟨_, hy, rfl⟩)⟩
  rintro hA a b ha hb hab w ⟨au, bv, ⟨u, rfl : u = x, rfl⟩, ⟨v, hv, rfl⟩, rfl⟩
  exact hA hv ha hb hab
#align star_convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset star_convex_iff_pointwise_add_subset
star_convex_iff_ord_connected:
theorem star_convex_iff_ord_connected [LinearOrderedField 𝕜] {x : 𝕜} {s : set 𝕜} (hx : x ∈ s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔ s.ord_connected := by
  simp_rw [ord_connected_iff_uIcc_subset_left hx, star_convex_iff_segment_subset, segment_eq_uIcc]
#align star_convex_iff_ord_connected star_convex_iff_ord_connected
star_convex_iff_open_segment_subset:
theorem star_convex_iff_open_segment_subset (hx : x ∈ s) : star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔ ∀ ⦃y⦄, y ∈ s → open_segment 𝕜 x y ⊆ s :=
  star_convex_iff_segment_subset.trans <| forall₂_congr fun y hy => (open_segment_subset_iff_segment_subset hx hy).symm
#align star_convex_iff_open_segment_subset star_convex_iff_open_segment_subset
star_convex_iff_forall_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex_iff_forall_pos (hx : x ∈ s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔ ∀ ⦃y⦄, y ∈ s → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 < a → 0 < b → a + b = 1 → «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y ∈ s :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun h y hy a b ha hb hab => h hy ha.le hb.le hab, _⟩
  intro h y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain rfl | ha := ha.eq_or_lt
  · rw [zero_add] at hab
    rwa [hab, one_smul, zero_smul, zero_add]
  obtain rfl | hb := hb.eq_or_lt
  · rw [add_zero] at hab
    rwa [hab, one_smul, zero_smul, add_zero]
  exact h hy ha hb hab
#align star_convex_iff_forall_pos star_convex_iff_forall_pos
star_convex_iff_forall_ne_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex_iff_forall_ne_pos (hx : x ∈ s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔
      ∀ ⦃y⦄, y ∈ s → x ≠ y → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 < a → 0 < b → a + b = 1 → «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y ∈ s :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun h y hy _ a b ha hb hab => h hy ha.le hb.le hab, _⟩
  intro h y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain rfl | ha' := ha.eq_or_lt
  · rw [zero_add] at hab
    rwa [hab, zero_smul, one_smul, zero_add]
  obtain rfl | hb' := hb.eq_or_lt
  · rw [add_zero] at hab
    rwa [hab, zero_smul, one_smul, add_zero]
  obtain rfl | hxy := eq_or_ne x y
  · rwa [Convex.combo_self hab]
  exact h hy hxy ha' hb' hab
#align star_convex_iff_forall_ne_pos star_convex_iff_forall_ne_pos
star_convex_iff_div:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Alternative definition of star-convexity, using division. -/
theorem star_convex_iff_div :
    star_convex 𝕜 x s ↔
      ∀ ⦃y⦄,
        y ∈ s → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → 0 ≤ b → 0 < a + b → «expr • » (a / (a + b)) x + «expr • » (b / (a + b)) y ∈ s :=
  ⟨fun h y hy a b ha hb hab => by
    apply h hy
    · have ha' := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left ha (inv_pos.2 hab).le
      rwa [mul_zero, ← div_eq_inv_mul] at ha'
    · have hb' := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hb (inv_pos.2 hab).le
      rwa [mul_zero, ← div_eq_inv_mul] at hb'
    · rw [← add_div]
      exact div_self hab.ne', fun h y hy a b ha hb hab =>
    by
    have h' := h hy ha hb
    rw [hab, div_one, div_one] at h'
    exact h' zero_lt_one⟩
#align star_convex_iff_div star_convex_iff_div
star_convex_empty:
theorem star_convex_empty (x : E) : star_convex 𝕜 x ∅ := fun y hy => hy.elim
#align star_convex_empty star_convex_empty
star_convex_Union:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
theorem star_convex_Union {ι : Sort _} {s : ι → set E} (hs : ∀ i, star_convex 𝕜 x (s i)) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x
      («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (s i)) :=
  by
  rintro y hy a b ha hb hab
  rw [mem_Union] at hy⊢
  obtain ⟨i, hy⟩ := hy
  exact ⟨i, hs i hy ha hb hab⟩
#align star_convex_Union star_convex_Union
star_convex_Inter:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
theorem star_convex_Inter {ι : Sort _} {s : ι → set E} (h : ∀ i, star_convex 𝕜 x (s i)) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x
      («expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »" (s i)) :=
  interₛ_range s ▸ star_convex_sInter <| forall_range_iff.2 h
#align star_convex_Inter star_convex_Inter
star_convex:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem set.ord_connected.star_convex [OrderedSemiring 𝕜] [OrderedAddCommMonoid E] [Module 𝕜 E] [ordered_smul 𝕜 E]
    {x : E} {s : set E} (hs : s.ord_connected) (hx : x ∈ s) (h : ∀ y ∈ s, x ≤ y ∨ y ≤ x) : star_convex 𝕜 x s :=
  by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain hxy | hyx := h _ hy
  · refine' hs.out hx hy (mem_Icc.2 ⟨_, _⟩)
    calc
      x = «expr • » a x + «expr • » b x := (Convex.combo_self hab _).symm
      _ ≤ «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y := add_le_add_left (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hxy hb) _
      
    calc
      «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y ≤ «expr • » a y + «expr • » b y :=
        add_le_add_right (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hxy ha) _
      _ = y := Convex.combo_self hab _
      
  · refine' hs.out hy hx (mem_Icc.2 ⟨_, _⟩)
    calc
      y = «expr • » a y + «expr • » b y := (Convex.combo_self hab _).symm
      _ ≤ «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y := add_le_add_right (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hyx ha) _
      
    calc
      «expr • » a x + «expr • » b y ≤ «expr • » a x + «expr • » b x := add_le_add_left (smul_le_smul_of_nonneg hyx hb) _
      _ = x := Convex.combo_self hab _
      
#align set.ord_connected.star_convex set.ord_connected.star_convex
smul_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.smul_mem (hs : star_convex 𝕜 0 s) (hx : x ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht₀ : 0 ≤ t) (ht₁ : t ≤ 1) :
    «expr • » t x ∈ s := by simpa using hs.add_smul_mem (by simpa using hx) ht₀ ht₁
#align star_convex.smul_mem star_convex.smul_mem
smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.smul (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (c : 𝕜) : star_convex 𝕜 («expr • » c x) («expr • » c s) :=
  hs.linear_image <| linear_map.lsmul _ _ c
#align star_convex.smul star_convex.smul
segment_subset:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `segment -/
theorem star_convex.segment_subset (h : star_convex 𝕜 x s) {y : E} (hy : y ∈ s) : segment x 𝕜 y ⊆ s :=
  star_convex_iff_segment_subset.1 h hy
#align star_convex.segment_subset star_convex.segment_subset
prod:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:177:8: unsupported: ambiguous notation -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.product -/
theorem star_convex.prod {y : F} {s : set E} {t : set F} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (ht : star_convex 𝕜 y t) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (x, y) (finset.product s t) := fun y hy a b ha hb hab => ⟨hs hy.1 ha hb hab, ht hy.2 ha hb hab⟩
#align star_convex.prod star_convex.prod
preimage_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.preimage_smul {c : 𝕜} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 («expr • » c x) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x («expr ⁻¹' » (fun z => «expr • » c z) s) :=
  hs.linear_preimage (linear_map.lsmul _ _ c)
#align star_convex.preimage_smul star_convex.preimage_smul
preimage_add_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/-- The translation of a star-convex set is also star-convex. -/
theorem star_convex.preimage_add_right (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (z + x) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x («expr ⁻¹' » (fun x => z + x) s) :=
  by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  have h := hs hy ha hb hab
  rwa [smul_add, smul_add, add_add_add_comm, ← add_smul, hab, one_smul] at h
#align star_convex.preimage_add_right star_convex.preimage_add_right
preimage_add_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/-- The translation of a star-convex set is also star-convex. -/
theorem star_convex.preimage_add_left (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (x + z) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x («expr ⁻¹' » (fun x => x + z) s) :=
  by
  rw [add_comm] at hs
  simpa only [add_comm] using hs.preimage_add_right
#align star_convex.preimage_add_left star_convex.preimage_add_left
open_segment_subset:
theorem star_convex.open_segment_subset (h : star_convex 𝕜 x s) {y : E} (hy : y ∈ s) : open_segment 𝕜 x y ⊆ s :=
  (open_segment_subset_segment 𝕜 x y).trans (h.segment_subset hy)
#align star_convex.open_segment_subset star_convex.open_segment_subset
neg:
theorem star_convex.neg (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) : star_convex 𝕜 (-x) (-s) :=
  by
  rw [← image_neg]
  exact hs.is_linear_image is_linear_map.is_linear_map_neg
#align star_convex.neg star_convex.neg
mem_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.mem_smul (hs : star_convex 𝕜 0 s) (hx : x ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht : 1 ≤ t) : x ∈ «expr • » t s :=
  by
  rw [mem_smul_set_iff_inv_smul_mem₀ (zero_lt_one.trans_le ht).ne']
  exact hs.smul_mem hx (inv_nonneg.2 <| zero_le_one.trans ht) (inv_le_one ht)
#align star_convex.mem_smul star_convex.mem_smul
mem:
theorem star_convex.mem (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (h : s.nonempty) : x ∈ s :=
  by
  obtain ⟨y, hy⟩ := h
  convert hs hy zero_le_one le_rfl (add_zero 1)
  rw [one_smul, zero_smul, add_zero]
#align star_convex.mem star_convex.mem
linear_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem star_convex.linear_preimage {s : set F} (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (f x) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x (s.preimage f) := by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  rw [mem_preimage, f.map_add, f.map_smul, f.map_smul]
  exact hs hy ha hb hab
#align star_convex.linear_preimage star_convex.linear_preimage
linear_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem star_convex.linear_image (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) : star_convex 𝕜 (f x) (s.image f) :=
  by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain ⟨y', hy', rfl⟩ := hy
  exact ⟨«expr • » a x + «expr • » b y', hs hy' ha hb hab, by rw [f.map_add, f.map_smul, f.map_smul]⟩
#align star_convex.linear_image star_convex.linear_image
is_linear_preimage:
theorem star_convex.is_linear_preimage {s : set F} {f : E → F} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (f x) s) (hf : is_linear_map 𝕜 f) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x (preimage f s) :=
  hs.linear_preimage <| hf.mk' f
#align star_convex.is_linear_preimage star_convex.is_linear_preimage
is_linear_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem star_convex.is_linear_image (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) {f : E → F} (hf : is_linear_map 𝕜 f) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (f x) («expr '' » f s) :=
  hs.linear_image <| hf.mk' f
#align star_convex.is_linear_image star_convex.is_linear_image
inter:
theorem star_convex.inter (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (ht : star_convex 𝕜 x t) : star_convex 𝕜 x (s ∩ t) :=
  fun y hy a b ha hb hab => ⟨hs hy.left ha hb hab, ht hy.right ha hb hab⟩
#align star_convex.inter star_convex.inter
affinity:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.affinity (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (z : E) (c : 𝕜) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (z + «expr • » c x) («expr '' » (fun x => z + «expr • » c x) s) :=
  by
  have h := (hs.smul c).add_left z
  rwa [← image_smul, image_image] at h

affine_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/-- The preimage of a star-convex set under an affine map is star-convex. -/
theorem star_convex.affine_preimage (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) {s : set F} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 (f x) s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 x («expr ⁻¹' » f s) := by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  rw [mem_preimage, convex.combo_affine_apply hab]
  exact hs hy ha hb hab
#align star_convex.affine_preimage star_convex.affine_preimage
affine_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ᵃ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/-- The image of a star-convex set under an affine map is star-convex. -/
theorem star_convex.affine_image (f : «expr →ᵃ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) {s : set E} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (f x) («expr '' » f s) :=
  by
  rintro y ⟨y', ⟨hy', hy'f⟩⟩ a b ha hb hab
  refine' ⟨«expr • » a x + «expr • » b y', ⟨hs hy' ha hb hab, _⟩⟩
  rw [convex.combo_affine_apply hab, hy'f]
#align star_convex.affine_image star_convex.affine_image
add_smul_sub_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.add_smul_sub_mem (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (hy : y ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht₀ : 0 ≤ t) (ht₁ : t ≤ 1) :
    x + «expr • » t (y - x) ∈ s := by
  apply hs.segment_subset hy
  rw [segment_eq_image']
  exact mem_image_of_mem _ ⟨ht₀, ht₁⟩
#align star_convex.add_smul_sub_mem star_convex.add_smul_sub_mem
add_smul_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem star_convex.add_smul_mem (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (hy : x + y ∈ s) {t : 𝕜} (ht₀ : 0 ≤ t) (ht₁ : t ≤ 1) :
    x + «expr • » t y ∈ s :=
  by
  have h : x + «expr • » t y = «expr • » (1 - t) x + «expr • » t (x + y) := by
    rw [smul_add, ← add_assoc, ← add_smul, sub_add_cancel, one_smul]
  rw [h]
  exact hs hy (sub_nonneg_of_le ht₁) ht₀ (sub_add_cancel _ _)
#align star_convex.add_smul_mem star_convex.add_smul_mem
add_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem star_convex.add_right (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (z : E) :
    star_convex 𝕜 (x + z) («expr '' » (fun x => x + z) s) :=
  by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain ⟨y', hy', rfl⟩ := hy
  refine' ⟨«expr • » a x + «expr • » b y', hs hy' ha hb hab, _⟩
  rw [smul_add, smul_add, add_add_add_comm, ← add_smul, hab, one_smul]
#align star_convex.add_right star_convex.add_right
add_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem star_convex.add_left (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (z : E) : star_convex 𝕜 (z + x) («expr '' » (fun x => z + x) s) :=
  by
  intro y hy a b ha hb hab
  obtain ⟨y', hy', rfl⟩ := hy
  refine' ⟨«expr • » a x + «expr • » b y', hs hy' ha hb hab, _⟩
  rw [smul_add, smul_add, add_add_add_comm, ← add_smul, hab, one_smul]
#align star_convex.add_left star_convex.add_left
add:
theorem star_convex.add {t : set E} (hs : star_convex 𝕜 x s) (ht : star_convex 𝕜 y t) : star_convex 𝕜 (x + y) (s + t) :=
  by
  rw [← add_image_prod]
  exact (hs.prod ht).is_linear_image is_linear_map.is_linear_map_add
#align star_convex.add star_convex.add
